description.ko: 끊임없이 내리는 비에 젖은 거대한 사이버펑크 대도시의 숨막히는 전경입니다. 우뚝 솟은 고층 빌딩이 스모그 가득한 하늘로 뻗어 있고, 화려한 네온 광고가 어둡고 복잡한 거리를 비춥니다.
description.en: A breathtaking view of a sprawling cyberpunk metropolis drenched in perpetual rain, where towering skyscrapers reach into the smoggy sky and neon advertisements illuminate the dark, busy streets below.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a sprawling cyberpunk city at night, heavy rain reflecting vibrant neon signs in puddles, towering skyscrapers with massive holographic advertisements, flying vehicles weaving through dense urban architecture, futuristic aesthetic, hyper-realistic, 8k, blue and magenta lighting, cinematic fog.
